name: Willow Hayward
title: Software Developer
mission: My goal in this world is simple: I want to make things.

experience.title: Angular Developer
experience.description_: As a member of the A&G Web Optimisation team, I was charged with improving developer experience. From improving build times to maintaining the common component library, this position had a diverse range of responsibilities attached.

experience.title: Head Teacher
responsibilities: Responsible for teaching basic programming to groups of up to 20 children

experience.title: Head Teacher

projects.name: Deadname Remover
projects.description: Removes the dead names of transgender individuals from their web browsers
info: Published on the Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome web stores
Over 15k users and more than 100 five-star reviews
Technologies used: JavaScript

projects.name: French Toast
projects.description: A networked browser based game created for Blue Beard Entertainment to help with playtesting and to promote the Kickstarter for a physical version
info: Online multiplayer through Lipwig networking platform
Thousands of games played
Technologies used: TypeScript, WebSockets (Lipwig)

projects.name: The Social Dial
projects.description: Interfacing with modern social media through analog technology
info: Interfaced a USSR telegraph key to Twitter and a 1985 dial phone to Facebook
Exhibited at the State Library of Queensland, May 2018; UQ Innovation Showcase, October 2018
Technologies used: Arduino, C, Python, JavaScript, NodeJS, WebSockets

projects.name: Lipwig
info: Designed for development of room based social games
Developed to act as Platform as a Service (PaaS) message server
Available on npm
Technologies used: TypeScript, NodeJS, WebSockets

projects.name: Coaster
info: Java project with 60 person development team
Responsible for procedurally generated terrain and object layering system
Extensive unit test coverage
Technologies used: Java, JUnit, Gradle

projects.name: Turrets
info: Originally developed using Coaster engine
Redeveloped with LibGDX Framework
Technologies used: Java, LibGDX
